comment: /**  * Add an ExceptionListener to the chained delegate list.  */
code: /**  * Add an ExceptionListener to the chained delegate list.  */ public final void addDelegate(ExceptionListener listener) {     Assert.notNull(listener, "ExceptionListener must not be null").     this.delegates.add(listener). }

comment: /**  * Return all registered ExceptionListener delegates (as array).  */
code: /**  * Return all registered ExceptionListener delegates (as array).  */ public final ExceptionListener[] getDelegates() {     return this.delegates.toArray(new ExceptionListener[0]). }
@Override public void onException(JMSException ex) {     for (ExceptionListener listener : this.delegates) {         listener.onException(ex).     } }
